item.description:
You're Invited to the East Coast Premiere of

Ocean Frontiers: The Dawn of a New Era in Ocean Stewardship
www.ocean-frontiers.org

Tuesday, April 3, 2012
New England Aquarium, Simons IMAX Theatre, Boston
7:00-8:30pm
Discussion panel to follow the film 8:30-9:00pm
This event is free and open to the public, online registration is requested:
http://tinyurl.com/​oceanfrontiersboston
Doors open 6:00pm. Check out the 20th Anniversary Stellwagen Bank
National Marine Sanctuary Exhibit in the IMAX Lobby.

Stellwagen Bank National Marine Sanctuary and the collaborative work to move shipping lanes to protect endangered whales is one of the four success stories from across the country featured in Ocean Frontiers.
item.name: MassBaySailors: Ocean Frontiers: The Dawn of a New Era in Ocean Stewardship
